description: The Greenhouse Gas Emissions Inventory details the estimated New York State emissions releases from fuel combustion.  The dataset includes a fuel type breakdown, by sector, for the current year.

metadata.attribution: New York State Energy Research and Development Authority
metadata.description: The Greenhouse Gas Emissions Inventory details the estimated New York State emissions releases from fuel combustion.  The dataset includes a fuel type breakdown, by sector, for the current year.

name: Greenhouse Gas Emissions From Fuel Combustion, By Fuel Type, Million Metric Tons
